# blendingState

**Instance Property**

Configure the blend state for color attachments the pipeline state uses.

## Declaration

```swift
var blendingState: MTL4BlendState { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property’s default value is `MTL4BlendStateDisabled`.
title: blendingState
